name: A poem for the frog pond.
name_original: A poem for the frog pond.
description:
A Shakespearean sonnet for frogs. Who says our amphibian friends aren't worthy of waxing poetics?

Play as a frog exploring a frog pond and its various inhabitants. Interact with the world around you to read the lines of a sonnet. 

I'm no wordsmith (or Wordsworth), but I hope you enjoy this little whimsical poem.
